entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27 except minus 32 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 except minus 32 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
